questions.question: What day comes 3 days after Tuesday?
questions.hint: Count on your fingers: Tuesday, then 1, 2, 3 days forward.

questions.question: How many months are in one year?
questions.hint: Think about all the months from January to December. Can you count them?

questions.question: What time is it when the minute hand points to 3 and the hour hand points to 8?
questions.hint: The minute hand on 3 means 15 minutes. Which number does the hour hand point to?

questions.question: About how many weeks are in one month?
questions.hint: Most months have around 30 days. How many groups of 7 is that?

questions.question: If it is 2:00 PM now, what time will it be in 2 hours?
questions.hint: Start at 2 and count forward 2 more hours. Does AM or PM change?

questions.question: What day comes 2 days before Saturday?
questions.hint: Go backwards from Saturday: one day back, then another day back.

questions.question: Which time shows 'quarter past 6'?
questions.hint: Quarter past means 15 minutes after the hour.

questions.question: What time is 1 hour before 10:00 AM?
questions.hint: Before means going backward in time. What number comes before 10?

questions.question: How many days are in one week?
questions.hint: Start with Sunday and count all the way to Saturday.

questions.question: What day is 4 days after Wednesday?
questions.hint: Count forward: Wednesday + 1 = Thursday, + 2 = Friday, keep going!

questions.question: Which time shows 'quarter to 5'?
questions.hint: Quarter to means 15 minutes BEFORE the hour. What hour comes before 5?

questions.question: Is 7:00 in the morning AM or PM?
questions.hint: AM is for morning time, before noon. PM is for afternoon and evening.

questions.question: What time is 3 hours after 9:00 AM?
questions.hint: 9 + 3 = ? And remember what happens at 12 o'clock during the day!

questions.question: What day comes right after Friday?
questions.hint: Think about the weekend. Which day starts the weekend?

questions.question: If today is Monday, what day was it 3 days ago?
questions.hint: Count backwards from Monday: Sunday, Saturday, then one more day back.

questions.question: What does the minute hand pointing to 6 mean?
questions.hint: Each number on the clock is worth 5 minutes. What is 6 times 5?

questions.question: Is 8:00 in the evening AM or PM?
questions.hint: Evening comes after noon. What do we call times after 12:00 noon?

questions.question: How many hours are in one day?
questions.hint: A clock goes around twice in one full day. How much is 12 + 12?

questions.question: What day is 5 days after Sunday?
questions.hint: Sunday + 5 days: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, then one more!

questions.question: What time is 2 hours before 6:00 PM?
questions.hint: Before means earlier. What is 6 minus 2?

questions.question: Which month comes right after June?
questions.hint: Think about summer months. June comes in early summer, then...

questions.question: What time shows 'half past 3'?
questions.hint: Half past means halfway through the hour. Where is the minute hand at half?

questions.question: If it is 11:00 AM, what time will it be in 2 hours?
questions.hint: 11 + 2 = 13, but clocks only go to 12. What happens after 12 during the day?

questions.question: What day is 2 days after Thursday?
questions.hint: Thursday + 1 = Friday. Then add one more day.

questions.question: Which is a time in the afternoon?
questions.hint: Afternoon is after 12:00 noon. Which time uses PM?

questions.question: What time is 'quarter to 9'?
questions.hint: Quarter to means 15 minutes before the next hour.

questions.question: How many minutes are in one hour?
questions.hint: When the minute hand goes all the way around the clock once, that's one hour.

questions.question: If today is Saturday, what day will it be in 1 week?
questions.hint: One week is 7 days. After 7 days, you return to the same day!

questions.question: What time is 1 hour after 7:30 PM?
questions.hint: Keep the minutes the same. Just add 1 to the hour.

questions.question: Which month has the fewest days?
questions.hint: Most months have 30 or 31 days, but one special month usually has only 28.

questions.question: What day comes 6 days after Monday?
questions.hint: Count forward 6 days from Monday. Almost a whole week!

questions.question: What time does the clock show when both hands point to 12?
questions.hint: When the minute hand points to 12, it means zero minutes past the hour.

questions.question: Is 12:00 noon AM or PM?
questions.hint: Noon is the middle of the day when AM switches to the afternoon time.

questions.question: What day is 3 days before Monday?
questions.hint: Go backward: Sunday is 1 before Monday, Saturday is 2 before, then one more.

questions.question: What time is 4 hours after 5:00 AM?
questions.hint: 5 + 4 = ? Is it still morning time?

questions.question: Which month comes right before December?
questions.hint: December is the last month. What month do we celebrate Thanksgiving?

questions.question: What time is 'quarter past 10'?
questions.hint: Quarter past means 15 minutes after. What is 10 o'clock plus 15 minutes?

questions.question: If it is 3:00 PM, what time was it 4 hours ago?
questions.hint: Go backward from 3:00 PM. Does the time cross over noon?

questions.question: How many months have 31 days?
questions.hint: Use the knuckle trick! January, March, May, July... keep counting the long months.

questions.question: What day is 1 day before Wednesday?
questions.hint: One day before means the day that comes right before Wednesday.

questions.question: A movie starts at 2:15 PM and lasts 2 hours. What time does it end?
questions.hint: Add 2 hours to the starting time. Keep the minutes the same.

questions.question: How many minutes are in half an hour?
questions.hint: An hour has 60 minutes. What is half of 60?

questions.question: If school ends at 3:30 PM and started 6 hours earlier, what time did school start?
questions.hint: Count backward 6 hours from 3:30 PM. You'll cross noon!

questions.question: What day is 10 days after Monday?
questions.hint: 10 days is 1 week plus 3 more days. Start at Monday, add a week, then 3 more.

questions.question: What time is 45 minutes after 6:00 PM?
questions.hint: Add 45 minutes to 6:00. Does it reach the next hour?

questions.question: Is midnight AM or PM?
questions.hint: Midnight is 12:00 at night, when a new day begins.

questions.question: If today is Thursday, what day will it be in 2 weeks?
questions.hint: 2 weeks is 14 days. After 14 days, you land on the same day of the week!

questions.question: What time is 30 minutes before 1:00 PM?
questions.hint: Go back 30 minutes from 1:00. What comes before 1 o'clock?

questions.question: How many days are in the month of April?
questions.hint: April is one of the months with 30 days. Think: 30 days has September, April...

questions.question: What time is 1 hour and 30 minutes after 10:00 AM?
questions.hint: First add 1 hour, then add 30 minutes.

questions.question: If a bus comes every 20 minutes and the last one came at 4:00 PM, when is the next bus?
questions.hint: Add 20 minutes to 4:00 PM.

questions.question: What day is 4 days before Sunday?
questions.hint: Count back from Sunday: Saturday, Friday, Thursday, then one more.

questions.question: What time in the evening is 7 hours after 12:00 PM?
questions.hint: Start at noon (12:00 PM) and add 7 hours.

questions.question: Which month comes 2 months after March?
questions.hint: March, then count two more months forward.

questions.question: How many hours are from 8:00 AM to 3:00 PM?
questions.hint: Count the hours from 8 to 12, then from 12 to 3.

questions.question: What time is 'half past 11'?
questions.hint: Half past always means 30 minutes after the hour.

questions.question: If it's 9:45 PM now, what time will it be in 30 minutes?
questions.hint: 45 + 30 = 75 minutes. That's more than an hour! What's left over?

questions.question: What day is the middle of the week?
questions.hint: If Sunday is day 1 and Saturday is day 7, which day is day 4?

questions.question: How many minutes are in 2 hours?
questions.hint: One hour is 60 minutes. What is 60 times 2?

questions.question: What time is 15 minutes before 5:00 PM?
questions.hint: Before means earlier. Subtract 15 minutes from 5:00.

questions.question: If a TV show lasts 45 minutes and starts at 7:00 PM, when does it end?
questions.hint: Add 45 minutes to 7:00 PM.

questions.question: What day will it be 8 days from Friday?
questions.hint: 8 days is 1 week plus 1 day. A week from Friday is Friday, then add 1 more day.

questions.question: What is 3 hours before 2:00 AM?
questions.hint: Go backward from 2:00 AM. You'll cross midnight!

questions.question: How many days are in June?
questions.hint: June is one of the 30-day months. Remember: 30 days has September, April, June...

questions.question: If lunch is at 12:30 PM and it's now 11:45 AM, how many minutes until lunch?
questions.hint: From 11:45 to 12:00 is 15 minutes. Then add 30 more to get to 12:30.

questions.question: What time is 'quarter to 12'?
questions.hint: Quarter to means 15 minutes before. What is 15 minutes before 12?

questions.question: Which month comes 3 months before October?
questions.hint: Count backward from October: September, August, then one more.

questions.question: What time is 2 hours and 15 minutes after 4:00 PM?
questions.hint: First add 2 hours to get 6:00 PM, then add 15 minutes.

questions.question: If today is Wednesday and your birthday is in 5 days, what day is your birthday?
questions.hint: Count 5 days from Wednesday: Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday, then one more.

questions.question: How many hours are from 6:00 PM to midnight?
questions.hint: Count from 6:00 PM to 12:00 AM (midnight).

questions.question: What time is 20 minutes after 3:40 PM?
questions.hint: 40 + 20 = 60 minutes. What happens when you reach 60 minutes?

questions.question: What day is 12 days after Tuesday?
questions.hint: 12 days is 1 week (7 days) plus 5 more days.

questions.question: If recess starts at 10:15 AM and lasts 20 minutes, when does it end?
questions.hint: Add 20 minutes to 10:15.

questions.question: What time is 5 hours after 10:00 PM?
questions.hint: 10 + 5 = 15, but after 12 you start over. You'll cross midnight!

questions.question: How many days are there from Monday to Friday (including both)?
questions.hint: Count: Monday (1), Tuesday (2), Wednesday (3), Thursday (4), Friday (?).

questions.question: What time is 40 minutes before 9:00 AM?
questions.hint: Go back from 9:00. 60 minus 40 is how many minutes past 8?

questions.question: Which is the first month of the year?
questions.hint: Think about when we celebrate New Year's Day!

questions.question: If dinner is at 6:00 PM and you need 45 minutes to get ready, when should you start?
questions.hint: Subtract 45 minutes from 6:00 PM.

questions.question: What day was it 6 days ago if today is Saturday?
questions.hint: Count backward 6 days from Saturday.

questions.question: How many minutes are in 1 hour and 15 minutes?
questions.hint: Convert 1 hour to minutes (60), then add 15 more.

questions.question: What time is 'half past 8' in the morning?
questions.hint: Half past means 30 minutes after. What AM/PM is morning?

questions.question: If it takes 25 minutes to walk to school and you need to arrive by 8:00 AM, when should you leave?
questions.hint: Subtract 25 minutes from 8:00 AM.

questions.question: What day is 9 days before Wednesday?
questions.hint: 9 days back is 1 week (7 days) plus 2 more days before.

questions.question: How many hours are from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM?
questions.hint: Count from 9 to 12 (3 hours), then from 12 to 5 (5 hours). Add them!

questions.question: What time is 1 hour and 45 minutes after 11:30 AM?
questions.hint: Add 1 hour (to 12:30 PM), then add 45 minutes.

questions.question: Which month has 28 or 29 days?
questions.hint: This is the shortest month. It has 29 days in leap years!

questions.question: If a basketball game starts at 4:30 PM and ends at 6:15 PM, how long was the game?
questions.hint: From 4:30 to 5:30 is 1 hour. Then count the remaining minutes to 6:15.

questions.question: What time is 6 hours before 1:00 PM?
questions.hint: Count back from 1:00 PM. You'll cross noon!

questions.question: What day is 11 days after Sunday?
questions.hint: 11 days is 1 week plus 4 days. Sunday + 7 = Sunday, then add 4 more.

questions.question: How many minutes are from 2:20 PM to 3:00 PM?
questions.hint: From 2:20, how many more minutes until you reach 3:00?

questions.question: What time is 'quarter past 1' in the afternoon?
questions.hint: Quarter past means 15 minutes after. Afternoon uses PM.

questions.question: If you wake up at 7:00 AM and go to bed at 9:00 PM, how many hours are you awake?
questions.hint: Count from 7:00 AM to 9:00 PM. Don't forget to cross noon!

questions.question: What day is 2 days before Thursday?
questions.hint: Go back: Wednesday is 1 before Thursday, then one more day back.

questions.question: What time is 50 minutes after 7:30 PM?
questions.hint: 30 + 50 = 80 minutes. That's 1 hour and 20 minutes!

questions.question: Which month comes right after September?
questions.hint: September ends, and then the spooky month with Halloween begins!

questions.question: How many hours are from noon to 8:00 PM?
questions.hint: Noon is 12:00 PM. Count from 12 to 8.

questions.question: If a train leaves at 9:45 AM and arrives at 12:15 PM, how long is the trip?
questions.hint: From 9:45 to 10:45 is 1 hour. Keep adding until you reach 12:15.

questions.question: What time is 35 minutes before 4:00 PM?
questions.hint: Go back from 4:00. 60 minus 35 equals how many minutes past 3?

questions.question: What day will it be in 15 days if today is Monday?
questions.hint: 15 days is 2 weeks plus 1 day. After 14 days, you're back to Monday.

questions.question: How many minutes are in 90 seconds?
questions.hint: 60 seconds equals 1 minute. What's left after taking out 60 from 90?

questions.question: What time is 4 hours after 11:00 AM?
questions.hint: 11 + 4 = 15. After 12 comes 1, 2, 3... and it switches to PM!

questions.question: If you start homework at 4:15 PM and finish at 5:00 PM, how long did you work?
questions.hint: From 4:15 to 5:00, how many minutes passed?

questions.question: What day is 7 days before Friday?
questions.hint: 7 days before is exactly one week before. Same day of the week!

questions.question: Which is later in the day: 10:00 AM or 10:00 PM?
questions.hint: AM is morning, PM is evening. Which comes later in a day?

questions.question: What time is 2 hours and 30 minutes before 6:00 PM?
questions.hint: Subtract 2 hours first (to 4:00 PM), then subtract 30 minutes.

questions.question: How many days are in November?
questions.hint: November is one of the 30-day months. Think: 30 days has September, April, June, and...

questions.question: If the clock shows 6:40, what time will it be in 25 minutes?
questions.hint: 40 + 25 = 65 minutes. That's 1 hour and 5 minutes!

questions.question: What day is 5 days before Tuesday?
questions.hint: Count backward 5 days from Tuesday.

questions.question: How many hours are from 7:00 AM to 7:00 PM?
questions.hint: From morning 7 to evening 7 is a full half day. How many hours is that?

questions.question: What time is 'quarter to 3' in the afternoon?
questions.hint: Quarter to means 15 minutes before. What's 15 minutes before 3:00 PM?

questions.question: If a pizza takes 35 minutes to bake and you put it in at 5:40 PM, when will it be ready?
questions.hint: 40 + 35 = 75 minutes. That's more than an hour!

questions.question: What day comes 13 days after Saturday?
questions.hint: 13 days is 1 week plus 6 days. Saturday + 6 days = ?

questions.question: How many minutes are from 1:15 PM to 2:00 PM?
questions.hint: From :15 to :00 of the next hour is how many minutes?

questions.question: What time is 8 hours after 6:00 AM?
questions.hint: 6 + 8 = 14. Since 14 is more than 12, subtract 12 and switch to PM.

questions.question: Which month is the last month of the year?
questions.hint: This month has Christmas and ends the year!

questions.question: If you practice piano for 30 minutes starting at 3:45 PM, when do you finish?
questions.hint: 45 + 30 = 75 minutes. That's 1 hour and 15 minutes past 3:00.

questions.question: What day is 4 days before Wednesday?
questions.hint: Count backward 4 days from Wednesday.

questions.question: How many hours are from 11:00 PM to 6:00 AM?
questions.hint: Count through midnight! From 11 PM to midnight is 1 hour, then to 6 AM...

questions.question: What time is 55 minutes after 2:10 PM?
questions.hint: 10 + 55 = 65 minutes. That's 1 hour and 5 minutes!

questions.question: If today is the 15th, what date was it 1 week ago?
questions.hint: One week is 7 days. Subtract 7 from 15.

questions.question: What time is 'half past 7' in the evening?
questions.hint: Half past is 30 minutes after. Evening uses PM.

questions.question: How long is it from 10:30 AM to 1:45 PM?
questions.hint: From 10:30 to 1:30 is 3 hours. Then add the extra 15 minutes.

questions.question: What day is 16 days after Wednesday?
questions.hint: 16 days is 2 weeks plus 2 days. Wednesday + 2 = ?

questions.question: What time is 10 minutes before 12:00 PM?
questions.hint: 12:00 PM is noon. 10 minutes before noon is still AM.

questions.question: How many days are in a leap year?
questions.hint: A regular year has 365 days. A leap year has one extra day in February!

questions.question: If soccer practice starts at 3:30 PM and lasts 1 hour 30 minutes, when does it end?
questions.hint: Add 1 hour to get 4:30 PM, then add 30 more minutes.

questions.question: What day was it 10 days ago if today is Thursday?
questions.hint: 10 days is 1 week plus 3 days. Go back 7 days (Thursday), then 3 more.

questions.question: What time is 3 hours and 20 minutes after 8:40 AM?
questions.hint: Add 3 hours first (11:40 AM), then add 20 minutes.

questions.question: Which month comes 4 months after February?
questions.hint: February, March (1), April (2), May (3), then one more month.

questions.question: How many minutes are from 4:35 PM to 5:20 PM?
questions.hint: From 4:35 to 5:00 is 25 minutes. Then add minutes from 5:00 to 5:20.

questions.question: What time is 9 hours after 8:00 PM?
questions.hint: 8 PM + 9 hours crosses midnight. 8 + 9 = 17, subtract 12...

questions.question: If today is the 22nd, what date will it be in 10 days?
questions.hint: Most months have 30 or 31 days. What happens after you pass the last day?

questions.question: What time is 'quarter past 4' in the morning?
questions.hint: Quarter past means 15 minutes after. Morning uses AM.

questions.question: How long is a school day from 8:00 AM to 2:30 PM?
questions.hint: From 8:00 AM to 2:00 PM is 6 hours. Then add the 30 minutes.

questions.question: What day is 18 days after Monday?
questions.hint: 18 days is 2 weeks plus 4 days. Monday + 4 = ?

questions.question: What time is 25 minutes before 3:15 PM?
questions.hint: Go backward 25 minutes from 3:15. 15 - 25 needs borrowing from the hour.

questions.question: How many days are in January?
questions.hint: January is one of the long months with the most days.

questions.question: If a movie is 2 hours and 15 minutes long and ends at 9:30 PM, when did it start?
questions.hint: Subtract 2 hours from 9:30 (to get 7:30), then subtract 15 more minutes.

questions.question: What day is 6 days after Thursday?
questions.hint: Count forward 6 days from Thursday. Almost a week!

questions.question: How many hours are from 5:00 AM to 10:00 PM?
questions.hint: From 5 AM to 5 PM is 12 hours. Then add hours from 5 PM to 10 PM.

questions.question: What time is 1 hour and 50 minutes after 10:20 AM?
questions.hint: Add 1 hour (11:20 AM), then add 50 minutes. 20 + 50 = 70!

questions.question: Which month is the 8th month of the year?
questions.hint: Count the months: January (1), February (2)... keep going to 8!

questions.question: If you started reading at 2:45 PM and read for 35 minutes, when did you stop?
questions.hint: 45 + 35 = 80 minutes. That's 1 hour and 20 minutes past 2:00.

questions.question: What day is 3 days after Sunday?
questions.hint: Sunday + 1 = Monday, + 2 = Tuesday, + 3 = ?

questions.question: How many minutes are in 2 hours and 45 minutes?
questions.hint: 2 hours = 120 minutes. Then add 45 more.

questions.question: What time is 7 hours before 3:00 PM?
questions.hint: Count backward from 3:00 PM. You'll cross noon!

questions.question: If today is the 28th of February in a leap year, what is tomorrow's date?
questions.hint: In a leap year, February has an extra day before March begins!

questions.question: How long is it from 11:15 AM to 2:45 PM?
questions.hint: From 11:15 to 2:15 is 3 hours. Then count from :15 to :45.

questions.question: What day is 20 days after Friday?
questions.hint: 20 days is 2 weeks plus 6 days. Friday + 6 = ?

questions.question: What time is 2 hours and 40 minutes after 9:30 PM?
questions.hint: Add 2 hours (11:30 PM), then add 40 minutes. You'll cross midnight!
